name: 心跳包
description: 每30秒发送一次心跳包，保持连接活跃
request_description: Prefix(0C) + MsgID(02000000) + Control(01) + Length(0200) + Length(0200) + Type(0400) + Data(空)
response_description: Prefix(B1CB7400) + Control(1C) + MsgID(02000000) + Unknown(00) + Type(0400) + ZipLength(0000) + Length(0000) + Data(空)
notes: 心跳包通常无响应或返回简单确认，数据域为空
